channel.title: Help
channel.description: How do u make a one man server? I click start server and then type a username and pass and it doesnt work. Then i try typing in what it says for the hybrid server example 0.0.0.0:4568 and it never loads. So does anyone know whats wrong? If yes plz tell.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

barrow101:

How do u make a one man server? I click start server and then type a username and pass and it doesnt work. Then i try typing in what it says for the hybrid server example 0.0.0.0:4568 and it never loads. So does anyone know whats wrong? If yes plz tell.

Get hamachi, then type in under server i.p. what number it says, for example…

name: ~ownage~
pass: *************
server i.p.: 5.144.191.196

Then go to file and click server port and a white box should appear and write in the number of what it says in run server for example 0.0.0.0:43594 <- write in 43594 as the port if it’s like that. Then click log in and BOOM! Your in, also to get people to join they just have to put in the right i.p. and the port and their in.

Read full topic
